snippet: The 6.8 percent decline in annual growth was the steepest slide since the economy faltered after the 2011 tsunami and earthquake.
lead_paragraph: The 6.8 percent decline in annual growth was the steepest slide since the economy faltered after the 2011 tsunami and earthquake.

headline.main: Japan's Economy Contracts After Sales Tax Increase
headline.print_headline: Japan's Economy Contracts After Sales Tax Increase
